# etc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of etc is to provide me with extraneous functions to make my life easier. It's just a varriety of bits and bobs in a nutshell.

## Installation

You can install the development version of etc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("natalia-mlad/etc")
```
